name: angular-esri-loader
description: An Angular (2+) service to help you load ArcGIS API for JavaScript Modules

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run ngc && npm run rollup && npm run copy
scripts.copy: copyfiles -u 1 "build/**/*{.d.ts,.js.map,.metadata.json}" dist && copyfiles -f src/package.json README.md dist
scripts.preversion: npm run test && git add README.md CHANGELOG.md

author: Tom Wayson <tom@tomwayson.com> (https://tomwayson.com)
